name: QuickSearch
description: A fast, semantic search API that indexes documents and returns precise, ranked results with relevancy signals.

name: QuickSummarize
description: Generate multi-length summaries for documents, meetings, and long-form content with configurable level-of-detail.

name: QuickAlerts
description: Real-time alerting and monitoring for content changes, anomalies, and important signals across your feeds.

name: QuickInsights
description: Analytical insights and auto-generated reports from your data, designed for business and product teams.

name: QuickAssist
description: Context-aware assistants that connect to your content and help users with tasks, explanations, and workflows.
